的.english: indicates possession, like adding 's to a noun

回.english: to return; to reply; to go back

开.english: to open; to start; to operate (a vehicle)

了.english: indicates a completed or finished action

吗.english: indicates a yes/no question (added to a statement)

请.english: please; invite; to treat someone to something

什么.english: what? (replaces the noun to turn a statement into a question)

想.english: think; believe; suppose; would like to

在.english: at; on; in; indicates an action in progress
